title: Slow cooker ham in ginger ale and pineapple
ingredients: ['1 joint gammon, skin on', '1 to 2 litres ginger ale (amount depends on your slow cooker capacity)', '2 tablespoons pineapple juice', '2 tablespoons grain mustard', '2 tablespoons runny honey', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', 'salt and pepper to taste']
